hideIndentGuide.description: Indicates if the package **override the editor indentation guide styles** to hide the indentation bar. As the package is using the indentation guide to inject specific styles into the editor, you won't be able to see it until you turn off this setting.

softTabsLength.description: Number of **virtual spaces** used to display your soft tabs. This package simulates the presence of invisible spaces to represent your soft tabs and will automatically adapt the editor sof tabs length to your needs. By default, the editor `Tab length` value is used.

useEditorConfigFile.description: Always use the `.editorconfig` file whether to apply soft tabs length. When enabled, the package will **look to an editor config file** in the root directory to detect indentation style, and apply the specified soft tabs length. If no configuration file is found, any soft tabs length will be applied to the editor. When disabled, the package will always apply the specified soft tabs length, even if no editor config file is detected.
